title: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay P2 -  B&O 1280480
description:
In this video we take a look at a small speaker from Bang and Olufsen that produces really big sound, the Beoplay P2.  For more information or to order please visit us at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/110920/Bang-Olufsen-BeoPlay-Sand-Stone-P2-Bluetooth-Portable-Speaker-1280480.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=BEOPLAYP2_2017062 

Features:
- Designer: Cecilie Manz
- Colors: Sand Stone
- Effective Frequency Range: 68 Hz - 21.000hz
- Connectivity: 1 X Usb-C For Charging And Microphone
- Materials: Polymer, Pearl Blasted Aluminium, Leather And Rubber.
- Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.2, Adk 4.0
- Microphone:
One Electret Type, Omni-Directional
Supports Apple Siri And Google Now Voice Commands.
- Power Amplifiers: 2 X 15w Class D For Woofer And Tweeter (2 X 50w Peak Power)
- Battery:
Up To 10 Hours Playtime At Moderate Listening Level.
Built-In Lithium-Polymer, Rechargeable, 7,2v, 2200mah, Li-Ion
Charging Time: 2 Hours
Smart Charging: With Beoplay P2’s Smart Charging Usb-C Cable, You Can Use Any Wall Charger.
- Beoplay App: Compatible With Beoplay App Which Will Enhance Your B&O Play Experience.
- On Device Controls:
Tap- And Shake Interactions Which Can Be Customized In Beoplay App.
Press The B&O Play Button On The Bottom Side To Turn Power On/Off.
